channel.title: Vibecoding on S.P.A.M.
channel.description: Recent content in Vibecoding on S.P.A.M.

item.title: Stupid Predictions for this Stupid LLM World
item.description: I’ve been reading a lot of blog posts on vibecoding and agents and LLMs - some sad about the future, some even keeled and measured, some breathlessly optimistic, some trying to rage bait you into engaging so they’re in your head longer (and then think of them when you want to buy something). I also keep thinking what dumb thing I might read next or might hear about from the world of LLMs/agents/vibecoding.
